Type.BattleDialog: You’re on your own.
You aren’t planning to wimp out already, are ya?
If we don’t get this job done, Kurokumo Clan’s gonna chop off all our heads…
We aren’t gonna need help from the Blade Lineage at this rate, eh?
This can’t be… Those bastards… must’ve cheated…
Shit… Why did the boss send that wuss with me?
This is why I don’t like cowards…
Won’t you do your job? I’m puttin’ in all the work here.
Now DIE!!! Haha! What a softskull.
So much for a Plague…
Why do we have to do all this just to deal with the Kurokumo…
It’s to get a hold of their weak point, so don’t complain too much.
Jikan is right. If we fail this, our Syndicate won’t be safe.
Hey! Get your shit together. This is no time to be complaining, is it?
They were a buncha weaklings. Didn’t even have to try.
This shit is all we need to grab the Kurokumo Clan by the balls?
Oof, my muscles… Let’s get back.
I don’t wanna die… This ain’t fair…
How strong are they…?
Shouldn’t’ve looked down on ‘em…
Things got more complicated.
Is no one here doing their job?
Might as well have fought the Kurokumo Clan head on.
This is gonna be done faster than I expected.
There’s still more… When is this gonna end?
They were pretty tenacious… But a tenderfoot’s a tenderfoot.
